general_info.summary: This document outlines various programs, schools, and initiatives at Sharda University for the 2025-26 academic year. It lists key departments like the School of Dental Sciences, School of Medical Sciences & Research, and Sharda School of Nursing Science & Research. Additionally, it details important reports and systems such as the Examination Annual Report and Academic Bank of Credits, along with student-focused services like career counseling, language initiatives, and entrepreneurship programs. The content also includes information on university structure, tenders, legal frameworks, COVID-19 updates, international collaborations, and specific portals like Paramarsh.

career_info.summary: This text outlines potential career paths for individuals completing a course in Nutrition and Dietetics. It highlights popular employment areas such as colleges, schools, research institutes, and both private and government hospitals, encouraging readers to pursue a career in allied health sciences.
career_info.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Popular areas of employment for such Nutritionists and Dietetics include:
• Colleges, Schools, Research institutes
• Private or Government Hospitals
Take the next step towards a career in allied health sciences.
